name: B1@ck&Wh!teWn$hu@ng
description: B1@ck&Wh!teWn$hu@ng is a game where the player will act as a hero to defeat monsters. The core is that the player will change its (either black which is a saber or white which is a shooter). The movement of the player and monsters is discrete that every time the player moves one tile, it will randomly change its duality. For the black saber, it can use its shield 3 times. For the white mode, it can shoot from distance and cast an ice ball for freezing the monsters(not implemented).
